title: Virtually You - Aboujaoude, Elias [Non-Fiction] Mobi/Epub/PDF_(K

While the Internet can enhance well-being, Elias Aboujaoude has spent years treating patients whose lives have been profoundly disturbed by it. Part of the danger lies in how the Internet allows us to act with exaggerated confidence, sexiness, and charisma. The first scrutiny of the virtual worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s transformative power on our psychology, Virtually You demonstrates how real life is being reconfigured in the image of a chat room, and how our identity increasingly resembles that of our avatar.
